thread.title: U.S. considers tightening grip on China ties to Corporate America

title: U.S. considers tightening grip on China ties to Corporate America
text:
U.S. considers tightening grip on China ties to Corporate America 8:25pm BST - 01:32
The U.S. government may start scrutinizing informal partnerships between American and Chinese companies in the field of artificial intelligence. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The U.S. government may start scrutinizing informal partnerships between American and Chinese companies in the field of artificial intelligence. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
